posts.post_title: F/S - T206 HOF and Short Print cards - PSA graded
posts.post_content:
For sale are the following listed T-206 cards. Payment by Paypal F/F to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. See scans attached. All cards are priced individually, shipping is included.

H. Pattee (Horz. Card), Piedmont 150, PSA 3, SOLD
K. Elberfeld (Wash. Portrait), Piedmont 350, PSA 2, SOLD
G. Davis, SC 150/25, PSA 3, SOLD
J. Tinker (Bat Off), Piedmont 350, PSA 3, SOLD
C. Bender (Trees in back), SOV 350, PSA 3, SOLD

Thanks,

Bill
I would like to purchase the Chief Bender
